--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/6/03 6:28:30 AM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > "We'll see," Empath states.  "I have my own revenge to take care 
of 
> > first - I'll consider your plan AFTER Hydras is dead."
> 
> She gazed at Empath. "Do you realize what you may be doing?" 
Pausing for a 
> moment.
> 
> "Hydras is partly Galvatron.... & Galvatron WAS once Megatron. I 
don't know 
> what Megatron he was before." pausing for a moment again. "You are 
walking a 
> fine line there, my fellow Decepticon. Such a choice should not be 
so 
> difficult. Or.. have these Autobot lackies softened you up?" She 
wasn't 
> entiredly thrilled with the idea of Hydras terminated. Was far 
better to 
> terminate those Autobots & their decendents.

"I made this decision long before I came to these 'Autobot lackeys', 
as you so affectionately term them.  The Megatron side of Hydras is 
nothing more than a Predacon wannabe who named himself after someone 
famous - and Galvatron is Galvatron, ruthless, uncaring, insane 
tyrant.  If he even remembers his time as the original Megatron, he 
pays it no heed."  Empath clenches her fists, and Vok energy crackles 
around them.  "He is going to pay through the nose for throwing away 
all those Decepticon lives just to save his own worthless hide."
